overview:
Rob Deeming is Director of Strategic Projects at Gilt Groupe, based in New York. He is also the co-founder of the European gaming platform, Amuso.

Prior to joining Gilt, Rob as COO at outside.in, the local news aggregator funded by CNN and Union Square Ventures.

Rob also worked as a case team leader with Bain in London and Copenhagen, and spent time with the iTunes group at Apple.

Rob is on the advisory board of a number of early New York companies, including Kickstarter and Refinery 29.

Rob received an MBA from Harvard Business School and holds a Masters in Mathematics and Engineering from Nottingham University.
